p: In this study, a total of 419 M. pneumoniae strains were isolated from patients with suspected M. pneumoniae infection in Osaka prefecture between 2011 and 2017. Table 1 shows the numbers of isolated M. pneumoniae strains per annum. Numbers of isolates differed from year to year, and their isolation frequency correlated well with the annual prevalence of M. pneumoniae pneumonia in Osaka prefecture ( Fig 1).
